name: Wikipedia - Simplified. Big Search Box. No fat.
description:
en.wikipedia.com

Browse and search Wikipedia without all the noise!

Features:
* Wikipedia's identity is pretty clear even without the logo so I felt I could remove it to make more room. 
* Sidebar has been removed except for the search box which I moved to the top of the page and made larger.
* Removed all the edit links, ads and such
* Works well on small window sizes too
